effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.2 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 646,613.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +1% Maximum Mana per unique Algari gem color

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description:
Use: Command the Medichopper to attach to your target, absorbing 269,720 damage and granting them 1,458 versatility for 15 sec.

While attached, your healing spells have a chance to refuel the chopper, granting these bonuses to their host again. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 135,739 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,235 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
